text: Nihsansaya, tumacya dhana ani pranadvare tumaci kasoti ghetali ja'ila ami avasya tumhala tya lokanci jyanna tumacyapurvi grantha dila gela ani anekesvaravadyanci manala duhkha denari bolani aikavi lagatila, tathapi tumhi dhira-sanyama rakhala ani allahaca adesa manala tara niscitaca he phara himatice kama ahe
